definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Once (he was)a worker , Pang Long now becomes a famous singer.
sentences.chinese: 庞龙曾经是个工人，现在变成一位著名的歌手。

sentences.english: The singer's performance gained a whole cheers.
sentences.chinese: 歌手的表演获得了满堂彩。

sentences.english: Kelley, a critically acclaimed singer-songwriter, is due to release a new album in February.
sentences.chinese: 作为创作型歌手的凯利将在明年二月发行新唱片。

sentences.english: Then the Mute Singer began to play his guitar, moving his lips with the music.
sentences.chinese: 沉默的歌手开始谈起吉他，嘴唇随着音乐张合。

sentences.english: The pop singer did it brown last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚那位流行歌歌手唱得很好。

sentences.english: 9-2. In those days wandering minstrels were welcome everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 当时，浪迹四方的吟游歌手到处受欢迎。

sentences.english: Crowds flocked after the popular singer as she left the theatre.
sentences.chinese: 当受欢迎的歌手离开剧院时，一大群人尾追着她。

sentences.english: It was the Mute Singer still holding his guitar.
sentences.chinese: 原来是沉默的歌手，他依然拿着吉他。

sentences.english: Li Yuchun is a Chinese pop singer.
sentences.chinese: 李宇春，中国新一代流行歌手。

sentences.english: Most singers are good at posing in front of cameras.
sentences.chinese: 大部份歌手都很擅长在镜头前摆姿势。

sentences.english: Three years earlier, she was the first-ever vocalist admitted to the Thelonious Monk Institute of Jazz Performance.
sentences.chinese: 三年前，她是第一次住进了歌手蒙克爵士乐学院性能。

sentences.english: Laure Shang was spotted getting busy for promo work for a brand.
sentences.chinese: 最近，中国歌手老何尚在为品牌升级工作而忙碌。

sentences.english: Since 14, I was determined to be a great singer.
sentences.chinese: 从14岁开始，我就决心成为一名伟大的歌手。

sentences.english: The perfect co-ordination of the dancers and singers added a rhythmic charm to the performance.
sentences.chinese: 舞蹈演员和歌手们配合得很好，使演出更具魅力。

sentences.english: Country singer Taylor Swift is among the nominees for Best New Artist.
sentences.chinese: 乡村歌手泰勒斯维夫提名为最佳年度新人。

sentences.english: Visit a local music store and sample each other's favorite artists.
sentences.chinese: 参观当地的音像店，选录对方喜欢的歌手音乐。

definition: sung performance/to sing for an audience
A-Mei, aka Gulilai Amit (1972-), aboriginal Taiwanese pop singer
Sandy Lam (1966-), Hong Kong pop singer
Coco Lee (1975-), pop singer, songwriter and actress
